BR_text.BRdescription:
If you go into the documentation, the "build instructions" link is broken.
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/openvinotoolkit/openvino/blob/master/get-started-linux.md>https://github.com/openvinotoolkit/openvino/blob/master/get-started-linux.md</denchmark-link>

comments_0.comment_text:
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/raymondlo84>@raymondlo84</denchmark-link>
 
 It would be great if you can submit a merge request, please see the <denchmark-link:https://github.com/openvinotoolkit/openvino/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING_DOCS.md#edit-existing-document>contributing</denchmark-link>
  document for guidance.
 This is the correct location for the build instructions: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/openvinotoolkit/openvino/blob/master/build-instruction.md>https://github.com/openvinotoolkit/openvino/blob/master/build-instruction.md</denchmark-link>
